com.kakao.auth.authorization.authcode

Interface AuthCodeService

  • package com.kakao.auth.authorization.authcode
public interface AuthCodeService
    This is an interface that abstracts various methods of getting authorization code from oauth server.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  AuthCodeService.Factory
      This is a factory class for various AuthCodeService types.

    • Method Summary

      Methods
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean handleActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, Intent data, AuthCodeListener listener) 
      abstract boolean isLoginAvailable()
      Checks whether authorization code can be retrieved from this service.
      abstract boolean requestAuthCode(com.kakao.auth.authorization.authcode.AuthCodeRequest request, com.kakao.auth.helper.StartActivityWrapper wrapper, AuthCodeListener listener)
      Request authorization code.

    • Method Detail

      • boolean handleActivityResult(int requestCode,
                           int resultCode,
                           Intent data,
                           AuthCodeListener listener)
        Parameters:
        requestCode - RequestCode of Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)
        resultCode - ResultCode of Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)
        data - Intent delievered from Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)
        listener - AuthCodeListener instance to get the result
        Returns:
        true if intent received by onActivityResult() is handled with this AuthCodeService, false otherwise.
      • boolean isLoginAvailable()
        Checks whether authorization code can be retrieved from this service.
        Returns:
        true if this service is available on this device, false otherwise
      • boolean requestAuthCode(com.kakao.auth.authorization.authcode.AuthCodeRequest request,
                      com.kakao.auth.helper.StartActivityWrapper wrapper,
                      AuthCodeListener listener)
        Request authorization code.
        Parameters:
        request - AuthCodeRequest instance containing AuthType and app information
        wrapper - StartActivityWrapper instance for activity or fragment
        listener - AuthCodeListener instance to get the result
        Returns:
        true if this auth code service succeeded requesting auth code, false otherwise
